title: Minneapolis Ski Club
subTitle: Year round nordic ski training programs for junior and youth skiers of all ability

cards.title: Spring 2021
cards.content: This is a great program for intermediate to advanced level skiers. Intermediate-Advanced would be skiers who need improvements in strength and technique. All sessions include technique, ski drills, and distance in the Spring.

cards.title: Summer 2021
cards.content: The 9 week summer program will begin June 14th and end on August 14th. Most sessions will include technique and distance. Wednesday sessions will focus more on intervals and speed

cards.title: Fall/Winter 2021-2022
cards.content: The full fall/winter schedule is not yet abailable
